Details:



WHY DOES THE LINE LOOK ROUGH: We weld the small glass with tin and copper foil by hand, so line on the surface not smooth, some also have a rough gap.


WHY DOES IT LOOK DARK: Tiffany lamps are mainly for decoration and reading. The stained glass shows a beautiful color but obstructs the light area.


WHY THE COLOR IN-HOMOGENEITY: The stained glass looks like a cloud or oil painting, the color is similar but not the same, some areas may be different.

WHY DOES IT LOOK LIKE PLASTIC: The small piece of glass has been joined together, so the percussion is depressing, but glass the weight is 2 times more than plastic, and couldn't be burned by fire, please test it.

 

 

 


Products Information:


Height: 16 inch (40cm) shade

Diameter: 16inch (40cm)

Socket: E26

Bulb Type: A-Max 60Watt 110V (Bulb not included) Halogen shows a much better effect than LED.

Lampshade: Stained Glass

Lamp base: Metal Base With Color Bronze Antique

Wire: 1.2M

Weight: 5 KG

 

 

 


Produce Process:


Cut glass: The craftsman should cut the big piece stained glass into thousands of small pieces, and smooth all the edge of the glass.


Copper foil: The craftsman binds the small glass with copper foil, this can help the glass be welded one by one.


Weld: The craftsman puts the small glass into the model according to the pattern and welds the glass with tin.


Surface treatment: After the weld, the lampshade needs to change the tin color into black with chemicals.

title: Selenite Satin Spar Crystal Stone Table Lamp
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (4-10 Days)

 

Handmade Selenite Satin Spar Crystal Stone Table Lamp

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy a 30-day money back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color:

White

 

 

 

 

Features:

 

  • You will receive exactly this Selenite Lamp - 395mm x 101mm x 98mm / 15 9/16 x 4 x 3 7/8 Inches; 4790g / 169 oz / 10.6 lb (see photo, the photos are taken under bright light, LED Bulb and Cord included, Working Voltage: 110V AC; Power: 3 Watt; LED: 64 LEDs; Lumen Color Temperature: Cool White 6000K-6500K)!
  • Selenite (Gypsum) is an evaporate mineral most commonly found in layered sedimentary deposits in association with halite, anhydrite, sulfur, calcite and dolomite. Gypsum (CaSO4.2H2O) is very similar to Anhydrite (CaSO4). The chemical difference is that gypsum contains two waters and anhydrite is without water. Gypsum is the most common sulfate mineral. Selenite is named after the Greek goddess of the moon, Selene.
  • Chemical Composition: CaSO4·2H2O; Category: Sulfate mineral; Mohs scale hardness: 2; Color: White.
  • Selenite is the colorless and transparent variety that shows a pearl like luster. Crystals are common and most often assume a tabular habit. "Satin Spar" comes from compact fibrous aggregate veins. This variety has a very satin like look that gives these crystals a play of light. Long thin crystals show bends and some specimens bend into spirals called "Ram's Horn Selenite''.
  • (The above information is provided solely for informational purpose. Kindly note that all stones are offered for decorative purposes only. Please, handle your stones with great care, do not grind or crumble them, do not dip or add them into your food or drink, do not use any parts of them in any elixirs, potions, lotions etc. Always make sure you wash your hands before and after working with your crystals.)



 

 

Details:

All our minerals and crystals are carefully measured with digital measuring instruments that provide the high accuracy of numbers/values!

body_html:
• About Case
  • Wholesale
  • Features
  • Protective Design
  • Grip Surface
  • Style
  • Questions and Answers
  • Product Reviews
Buy now

Ultra Slim Wooden Phone Case | Walnut / Bamboo Split

Our classic wooden phone cases are hand cut and crafted by our team of craftsmen for superior durability, quality and finishing. The case is form-fitted to your phone, staying true to your phone’s sleek and modern design while keeping your phone safe from drops, dents and dings along the way.

Features

  • Sleek ultra-thin, ultra-lightweight design that flushes right to your phone to minimize bulk
  • Available in mahogany, black walnut, aromatic cedar, or caramelized bamboo wood finish
  • Polycarbonate impact-resistant bumper for maximum protection
  • Snap-on application for quick & easy installation

Our ultra slim wooden phone cases are made from real, locally sourced woods that are hand selected by our team for maximum strength, superior quality and sleek style.


  1. Cedar

  2. Bamboo

  3. Mahogany

  4. Black Walnut

Ultra Slim, Ultra Protective Design

Featuring an ultra-slim, ultra-lightweight profile that flushes right to your phone, our wooden cases stay true to your phone’s sleek design while keeping our promise of protection with a polycarbonate impact-resistant bumper.

Sure Grip Surface

Stop worrying about your phone slipping through your fingers. Our ultra slim wooden phone case comes equipped with our specialty sure grip surface, keeping your phone in the palm of your hand – no matter what the conditions are.

Wooden Phone Cases Fit all the Following iPhone & Samsung Galaxy Models:

  • iPhone 6 / 6s - iPhone 6 / 6s Plus
  • iPhone 7 - iPhone 7 Plus
  • iPhone 8 - iPhone 8 Plus
  • iPhone X
  • Samsung Galaxy S7
  • Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge
  • Samsung Galaxy S8
  • Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus
  • Samsung Galaxy Note 8

A Style As Unique As You Are

Your style is your own; shouldn’t your phone case be your own too? Every phone case from WUDN uses 100% real wood, hand selected by our team got premium cut and quality to make sure no two WUDN cases are alike.

Customer Questions and Answers

  • Is the phone case covered in real wood?

    • Yes, every case is covered in real wood, hand selected by our team for beauty and uniqueness. Wood options for most all of our cases include Mahogany, Black Walnut, Carmalized Bamboo or Aromatic Cedar.

  • How well will this case fit my phone?

    • The slim-case fits your phone perfectly. No blockage of the camera port. Sure grip textured sides to enhance your grip and easy access to all ports and buttons.

  • Does the phone case protect my screen?

    • Yes, our slim-cases have a slightly raised lip around the front edge to prevent your phone screen from touching surfaces when placed facedown. Of course, you should always add a glass screen protector.

  • Can I still use Qi wireless charging with this phone case?

    • Yes, WUDN slim cases do not interfere with Qi wireless charging for iPhone 8 and X models or for Samsung Galaxy phones. Just be sure to center the Qi receiver in the middle of your charging pad.

  • Does the phone case protect my camera?

    • Yes, the phone camera is recessed behind the camera cutout. Although the camera is not covered, because that would result in potato quality photos, the camera should be safe from typical drops.

  • Will a case protect the resale value of my phone?

    • Yes, keeping your phone in excellent condition goes a long way towards maintaining high resale and trade-in value. You should keep your phone in a case at all times - and always add a real glass (not plastic screen protector). As iPhones and Samsung Galaxy phones get more expensive, the resale and trade-in value has been going up as well. For $25 now, you could add several hundred dollars to the value of your phone when it's time to upgrade.

  • Will I need a dongle for my headphones?

    • No, the WUDN slim cases come with a properly sized cutout for the headphone port (on iPhone 6 models) and lightning port. You will NOT need a dongle for your headphones.

  • Can the WUDN case be used with magnetic car and wall mounts?

    • WUDN cases do not come with a steel plate built in. We are looking to add that feature in the future. In the meantime, we know of many customers that have added a steel plate inside their WUDN case with great results. Here is a 4-pack of metal plates designed exactly for this purpose.

  • How do you make a wooden cell phone case?

    • We did a long form blog post about that complete with pictures and videos. Take a look: We Built a Laser Engraved Phone Case from Scratch

  • Should I buy more than one WUDN phone case?

    • Of course. We have a number of designs from cool artistic skulls to the "Sawtooth Mountains Traveler", and most of our cases are available in different wood types and species. You should have a couple of cases, at least, to change your style to match the moment. Mondaythrough Friday in the office call for a simple, conservative case, and Fridays in the club call for something with a bit more style.

  • Will the wood get stained and ugly?

    • It could, but unlike plastic and other synthetic materials, our wood cases actually get better looking over time. We ship our cases with only one light layer of polyurethane. This means the case will age and the more you use it, the more the wood will look authentic and vintage. Some artisans actually use coffee to stain wood in beautiful mocha hues. (make sure your phone is out of the case when you decide to drop it in your coffee).

  • Can I customize or personalize my phone case?

    • Of course, we offer a full custom shop here. The process is simple: find your image or logo (in black and white - jpg format) and send it to us. Pretty straightforward. We will get to work on design and production right away. You can also customize or personalize a matching journal/planner, mousepad or flask. How cool to have a personalized wooden phone case and a set of matching wood accessories.

  • What is TPU and why do I care?

    • Thermoplastic Urethane - A hybrid material, TPU is a mixture between hard plastic and soft silicone. A very dense and smooth rubber, TPU cases are made to slide in and out of the pocket easily, without attracting lint. TPU cases are more durable, slightly elastic and much stronger than silicone. WUDN uses TPU case templates which are then covered by real wood.

  • Should I get matching sunglasses made of wood?

    • Duh. How cool are you on Saturday afternoon with a Bamboo phone case and matching Bamboo Frame Sunglasses. Seriously.

Trees clean our air, give us shade, and provide us with delicious 's why for every tree that gives it's life for our products we will plant one, 1 for 1.

  • Type: Air Purifier
  • USB output: 5V 2.1A
  • Power cord length: 4.5m
  • Size: Size: 110*110*400mm
  • Rated power: 7W
  • Input: 12V
  • Noise: 55dB



Description:

 

The smell of bad air in a car can affect not only your driving experience, but also your health. There are many ways to get rid of car odors, and the most effective one is to choose a suitable car air purifier. This Smart Dual Car Air Purifier is a good choice! With dual fans and dual filter elements, this car air purifier can quickly purify the air inside the car and provide you with a comfortable environment inside the car.


Features:


- With lightweight and compact design, it is portable and easy to store.
- With extra long power cord, you can install the air purifier in the right place.
- Nice appearance and exquisite workmanship make it look more fashionable.
- High quality DC motor is adopted for ensuring high purification performance.
- Double fan and double filter element design make the filter more effective.

Parameter:

Size: 110 x 110 x 400mm
Power cord length: 4.5m
Rated power: 7W
Input: 12V
USB output: 5V 2.1A
Noise: 55dB
Product weight: about 1000g

Notes:

- The car and car accessories are not included.
- Air purifier mounted on front seat headrest is not recommended.
- Make sure the purifier is firmly installed before using.
- There may be an error of 1 - 2cm in size due to manual measurement.
Type: Air Freshener And Purifiers
Package weight: 3.0000 kg
Package size (L x W x H): 20.00 x 20.00 x 20.00 cm / 7.87 x 7.87 x 7.87 inches

body_html:

Smart Electric Disinfection Box

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.















Product Parameters:

Product Name: Adrtek UV Ozone Mobile Phone Sterilization Box
Product Model: HAO79 / HA079-C
Product Size: 200 * 120 * 45mm
Power Cord Length: 100cm
Rated Voltage: 5V2A
Maximum Power: 10W
UV Lamp: 2PCS
UV Wavelength: 2537nm
Power Input Interface: Micro-USB
Executive Standard: GB4706.1-2005 packing list Mobile phone sterilization box X1 Power cord X1 Cleaning cloth X1 Manual X1 Certificate X1 common problem


-How to disinfect the mobile phone?
Before use, please provide 5V2A power input into the device, open the cover and insert the phone, close the cover and press the switch, the light is turned on, wait 10 minutes and the disinfection is completed.

-How to pause during disinfection?
If you need to use the mobile phone during the disinfection process, you can directly open the cover, automatically suspend the disinfection, and cover it again to continue the disinfection.

Details: 

Extremely low wattage. Perfect for doghouses, basements, garages, barns, sheds, porches or any other outdoor shelter. This soft, orthopedic bed is unique in that it will still provide soft, comfortable warmth even in subzero weather! Super soft PVC is used on the exterior to ensure the bed doesn't absorb water and stay wet like a fabric bed would.

All heated beds and pads feature dual thermostats and are designed to warm to your pet's normal body temperature when he/she lies on the pad. When your pet is not on the pad, the heat will dissipate into the air and the surface temperature will vary according to the ambient air temperature. All heated products are thermostatically controlled to heat to 102 F, regardless of the size.

Dual thermostat simply means there are two internal thermostats that will keep the surface of the bed at 10-15 F above ambient air temperature when your pet is not on the bed. When your pet lies on the bed, it will warm to about 102 F.

This lamp also has a memory mode, no need to adjust all the time, brings more convenience.

With a service life of 50,000 hours (about 20 years), it will not burn out or overheat, saving money and energy. Gives warm, soft light, no flicker, no glare, better protection for your eyes!
  • 💡【Rugged AND SAFE DESIGN】This lamp is about 65 inches high and weighs only 11.9 pounds. You can move the lamp to any place you want to illuminate. The light has a weighted base that prevents tipping, safe to have around children and pets. and easy to use on/off pedal switch, allowing you to easily tap the light with your foot.
  • 💡【100% SATISFACTION SERVICE】The black floor lamp comes with 12-month service! We always stand behind our products, if any issues please feel free to email us. Our Customer Service are very pleasure to assist you to resolve any problems until your 100% satisfaction!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Details:

Smart Life supports two types of distribution network modes: EZ mode and AP mode, and EZ mode is the default mode.

EZ mode: The smart light bulb is in a fast flashing state. (twice about one second)


AP mode: The smart light bulb is in a slow flashing state. (about 2 seconds at a time)

 

 

 

 

 



Note:

The connection speed is related to the network. If the connection is not successful, try connecting again!!!!

 

 

 

 

 



APP Connection Method:

1. Turn off the power and install the bulb.
2. Turn on the power and you can see the bright white light.
3. Download the APP '' Smart Life '' from APP Store (for IOS) and Google Play Store (for Android), and register with phone number/email/Social Media Account.
4. Open APP '' Smart Life '' - Press '' Add Device '' - Press '' All button '' - Select '' Lighting Devices '' , then enter the add Device page.
5. Power your smart light on, light will blinks rapidly, if not blink. please reset your smart light. (Reset process: Power off 10s and then power on, turn on-off-on-off-on, light will rapidly blink)
6. Confirm light blink rapidly- Enter Wi-Fi password to connect with light.

 

 

 

 

 

 


Note:

The connection speed is related to the network. If the connection is not successful, try connecting again!!!!

 

 

 

 

 

 



Set up your Echo speaker by Alexa:

1. You can download the Amazon Alexa App from Google Play or the App Store. Then log in with your Alexa account and password. (If you are not registered, please register first).


2. Enter Smart Life in the Alexa APP skills. Select Smart Life in the search results and click Enable Skills. Enter the username and password you previously registered in the Smart Life app and authorize it. In the Discovery Devices dialog box that pops up, click Discover Device.


3. After the above operation is successful, you can use Echo Alexa to control the light bulb.

body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (2-5 Days)

 

Original Smart LCD Digital Body Weight Scale (Up To 400IBS)

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

Color: Gray

Features:

  • HIGH ACCURACY DIGITAL SCALE: 4 highly precise sensors provide accurate and stable readings; Measure range from 11Lb-400Lb （5-180kg）; Graduation increments of 0.2lb /0.1kg.
  • LARGE LCD DISPLAY & EASY TO READ: Backlit 3.25 inch LCD display; modern-style, smooth, sleek surface that’s dependable and easy to clean; Large numbers and bright back-lit display are easy to read.
  • EASY TO USE: Immediate readings as soon as you step on the bathroom scale, It looks great and easily fits into almost anywhere in your shower, bedroom or office.
  • MULTI-FUNCTION: The Digital Scale is Auto-power-off , Auto-zero, Auto-calibration; Low battery and overload indication; measures in both lb and kg.
  • WARRANTY: 1-year warranty and lifetime support on our bath scales digital weight from Moss and Stone; runs on 2 AAA batteries (Not Included).


 

Details:

A clear step towards a healthy lifestyle Staying fit and healthy is a numbers game—that's why this professional digital scale uses four high precision sensors to instantly deliver trustworthy results with a 0.2 lb accuracy resolution. Reading your results is simple thanks to the size-able, sharp LCD display and seamless unit conversion with a single button. Built for precision and performance

The ultra chic tempered glass platform is not only durable but also has an auto on/off feature for superior convenience and maximum battery life. Low battery and overload indication deliver vital safeguards during use.

 

 

Specifications:

Weight Capacity: 400 lb (180 kg)

Graduation: 0.1kg/0.2lb Units: Kg / Lb

Dimensions:12"x12"x0.7"

Platform: 6mm tempered glass

Auto-Multi-function: Low battery/ Overload indication; Auto on/Off/ Zero LCD Display-3.25"

 

 

Note:

1. For best accuracy, please lay the digital bathroom scale on hard and flat surface, and stand on the central area. Avoid carpet or soft surface.

2. To avoid inaccurate weight results, please re-calibrate the scale after physically moving or shifting it or when replacing the batteries.

3. To calibrate, apply weight on the scale, then step off and wait 10-15 seconds for the LCD screen to display "0.0". Then, step back on the scale to weigh with accurate results.

4. Body weight naturally fluctuates throughout the day. People are lighter when they wake up, heavier in the middle of the day, and lighten again toward the end of the day.

5. This scale was designed for measuring weights of at least 11 lb. For lighter objects, we suggest an Moss and Stone's Kitchen Scale. Batteries Not Included.

Handmade Wooden Coasters

Handmade & Homegrown:

Every wooden coaster is made right here in the USA by hand from locally sourced, hand selected black walnut, aromatic cedar, caramelized bamboo or rich mahogany wood.

The aged wood components are individually handcrafted to make a beautiful and functional addition to any table, bar or buffet.

The natural wood grain and finish makes each one unique. Each set will add beauty, elegance, style and character to any home.

Made from American Birch Plywood. The plywood is formaldehyde free using soy-based technology, LEED compliant, CARB compliant.

Handcrafted in Hidden Springs, Idaho, the simple and functional design is made from real wood. 

A Size for Every Occasion

No matter if you’re on-the-go, in the office or at your home bar, our WUDN Wooden Coasters come in a variety of styles and sizes so you’ll always have on by your side. Choose from Round, Square or Hexagon Styles and any of four wood types.

As Tough as The Trees They Come From

Our woods are hand selected by our team of local craftsmen, ensuring that every cut we work with is built to stand the test of time and last for ages to come.

Trees clean our air, give us shade, and provide us with delicious food.. That's why for every tree that gives it's life for our products we will plant one 1 for 1.

body_html:
Bounce Off Spiel Aktivieren Ball Spiel für Kind, Familie Und Party Desktop Spielzeug Prellen

  • Bounce Off Spiel Set: Größe: Spiel board -27*27cm, set enthält eine Gameboard, 16 kugeln, 9 karten.

  • Material: Diese Springenden ball spiel set ist aus hochwertigem kunststoff, ist sicher und Ungiftig. Dies ist ein spiel, ist sehr testable für ausdauer und genauigkeit. Es ist sehr geeignet für familie mitglieder. Es hat voll von funktionen zu halten ihre Kinder beschäftigt für stunden.
  • Spiel regeln: Unterteilt In zwei teams (zwei-farbe ball), nach der modus der spiel karte Fordert, und die teamkollegen die aufgabe abzuschließen. Rennen, um das muster auf Die herausforderung karte durch bouncing balls in die grid.
  • Eltern-Kind Interaktive Spielzeug-Zug die fähigkeit der kinder der hände und füße Koordination, stärken die kommunikation der begleiter oder eltern mit die Kinder. Dies ist eine gute wahl!
  • Wie zu gewinnen: Es Sind insgesamt neun karten, die wird erhalten werden egal, wer rundet Die karte erinnerung modus. In das ende,, wer gewinnt mehr karten, wer der gewinner ist.

Beschreibung:

  • Die verwendung von ABS Umwelt freundliche kunststoff ist unschädlich für den menschlichen körper.
  • Beitragen zu gehirn Entwicklung und verbesserung der hand-auge-koordination.
  • Verbessern die gefühle Zwischen kinder und eltern.

title: Sprinkler Splash Pad For Kids 68IN Inflatable Blow Up Pool Sprinkle Play Mat Summer Outdoor Water Toys
body_html:
Highlights

68IN Splash Play Mat

Safe & Non-Toxic Material

Details

*Features*:

*68IN Splash Play Mat*:The 68-inch sprinkler mat is spacious enough for 3-4 kids,and can be installed in yard,patio,driveway or deck,perfect for children parties in this summer that can entertain many kids at once. Recommend for 3 years old and up.
*Safe & Non-Toxic Material*:Made from strictly selected PVC materials,the summer sprinkler mat is BPA free and 100% safe for your little ones. Parents can rest assured that their children will have a good time playing without being exposed to harmful chemicals.
*Easy To Set Up*:Just plug it to a garden hose or PVC tubing,simply adjust water pressure to lower or higher the spray height. The water injection port is designed with waterproof gasket for easier installation to ensure strong and beautiful joints.
*Easy Storage*:The splash play mat could be folded small size(like a book) for easy storage. Do not forget to place small waterproof ring into hose connection to avoid water leakage.
*Best Outdoor Water Toy*:Children pets and dogs will be excited to play in the sprinkle and spray. Perfect for relaxation,party or celebration at lawn,garden,swimming pool or beach. With a learning mat for a base,so your little squirt soaks up some knowledge during play!

Warning Tips:
1. Continuous and competent adult supervision of children and the disabled is required at all times.
2. Spray mat and spray mat accessories are to be handled,assembled and disassembled by adults only.
3. This spray mat is for outdoor use only.
4. The spray mat should only be set up on flat and level ground. Do not set up the spray mat on a slope or inclined surface. It is recommended to use it on the lawn.
5. The ground must be firm and strong enough to withstand the pressure and weight of a fully set up spray mat Do NOT set up the spray mat on mud,sand,soft or loose soil,deck,platform,concrete,rock,asphalt or any other hard surfaces.
6. Do not place spray mat near or under overhead electrical lines.
7.After connecting the water pipe,the water will continuously gush out,it needs to be connected to the faucet all the time.
8. After using,clean the mesh screen with dish soap and water,then hang it up to keep it dry.
*Specifications*:

Product Type: Sprinkler & Splash Mat
Color: Blue
Material: PVC
Recommended Age: 3 Years Old And Up Under The Supervision Of Adult
Mat Diameter: 170cm/68inch
Product Weight: 0.85kg/1.87lbs
*Package Lists*:

1 x Kids Sprinkle Mat
1 x Sprayer Connector (US)
1 x Leak-Proof Rubber Ring
1 x Repairing Patch
1 x User Manual

title: Stainless Steel Chute Masticating Juicer
body_html:
class="detailmodule_html">





Free Shipping Worldwide (4-10 Days)

 

U-Shape Heated Neck Massage Pillow

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

Free Shipping Worldwide (5-10 Days)

 

Stainless Steel Chute Masticating Juicer

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

Specifications:

Color: As the picture shows
Main Material: Stainless steel + PC
Overall Dimension: 10.2" x 7" x 20.5" (L x W x H)
Net Weight: 9.5 lbs
Power: 150 W
Voltage: 110~120 V
Speed: 60 RPM
Noise: Less than 60 dB
Max. Operation time: <30 min
Package Includes:
1 x Slow juicer machine
1 x Pusher
2 x Cup (1000ml/34oz)
1 x Brush
1 x Instruction
Key Features:
Slow Squeezing Technology for Highest Nutrition: The slow juicer machine spins at 60 RPM to extract high purity juice and maintain high nutritional value, ensuring less heat build up and oxidation. Using advanced slow cold press masticating squeezer mechanism technology, the slow grind juice preserves more vitamins, enzymes and other heat-sensitive nutrients from being destroyed than centrifugal juicers.
Reverse Function& Dishwasher Safe Accessories: Featuring reverse function, the slow juicer machine is effortless to clean with flush water and avoids stuck. All accessories can be cleaned safely in your dishwasher, saving a lot of time and energy. Additionally, equipped with a bonus brush, you can clean the machine in a more efficient and faster way.

Wide Feed Chute Compact Size: 3.4 inch wide feed chute accepts most whole fruits and vegetables without cutting at ease, reducing your prep times. The juice extractor with large internal capacity occupies very little space on your counter-top and fits in most kitchen cabinets. It comes with 2 outlets for juice and dry pulp separately, one of which has a cap to lock juice fresh and reduce the oxidation.
Quiet Operation with Safe Design: The masticating juicer extractor with the safety system will not operate unless the juicer cover and other parts are correctly installed.
The bottom is specifically designed with non-slip pad to further enhance stability and avoid the possibility of tipping over. The sound of our machine is below 60 dB, without disturbing others or waking up the sleeping baby.
Food Grade Material for Healthier Life: The slow juicer machine is made of environmentally friendly and odorless stainless steel PC materials, which is non-toxic and harmless to the human body. Using high quality and food-grade materials, all detachable parts are BPA free. It's a perfect gift that brings health and happiness to every family member.
Description:

This is upgraded slow juicer machine which provides a healthy, quiet and exquisite life for your family.
 
Using advanced slow cold press masticating squeezer mechanism technology, the machine keeps the juice with maximum nutrition, minimal oxidation, less foaming, and the best taste. It helps remain much more enzymes, vitamins, minerals, and trace minerals, which lost in the heat generated by a high speed juicer. It's worth mentioning that the 3.4 inch wide feed chute can accept most whole fruits and vegetables without cutting. Reverse function and a free brush prevent the juicer from stuck and save you from the trouble of cleaning. And the machine is easy to operate with just one button. Additionally, the juicer is made of high-quality food-grade stainless steel to ensure safety and durability during use.
 
It offers convenience and adequate nutrition to busy office workers, elderly people with bad teeth and children who don't like eating fruits. A healthier life starts with a glass of fresh juice every day! Don't hesitate to buy it!
 
Use slow masticating technology to provide higher juice yield and nutritional value than a centrifugal juicer
Low speed of 60 RPM, efficiently extract higher purity juice, perfectly separate juice, and pulps.

Noiseless than 60dB, enjoy a quiet and healthy life when making juice
3.4" wide feed chute to accept the whole fruits and vegetables without cutting, reducing your prep times
Reverse function avoids stuck and helps you to clean conveniently
Easy to operate with a simple button, saving time and energy
Waterproof switch for safety in various damp places
Food grade stainless steel material, BPA free and non toxic, harmless to the human body.

Dishwasher safe accessories and a bonus brush for an effortless cleanup
Non drip magic juice plug stays juice fresh and avoids fast oxidation
With a handle for labor-saving movement and cleaning
Non slip pads add stability and prevent from tipping over
Compact size design, take up less

Description:

This electric thermos pot uses food grade 18/8 stainless steel to make the inner container so that you can rest assured of its safety.

 

It features a LCD display with night light function for easy operation through which you can know the current water temperature and the display shows five stages of temperature(including 40, 50, 60, 85, 98) Celsius . This hot water dispenser is equipped with 3 different water dispensing methods: Air pump water outlet & Dispense water outlet & Cup water outlet. It's worth mentioning that the first one can be operated without power. It has a re-boil function to quickly bring water back to boiling. And the timer function allows water to be heated to the temperature desired at the perfect time when needed.

Details: In association with National Geographic, works together with talented artisan designers around the world to produce stunning, keepsake treasures. Our mantra is to spread global happiness, so rest assured - we’ll do everything we possibly can to ensure you’re a happy customer.

About this item: Like flames, fluid shapes form a beautiful cross. In the center, a turquoise hemisphere suggests the planet, while arrows at the tips point in the four cardinal directions. Alejandro de Esesarte crafts this elegant steel wall sculpture that suggests a commission to take the story of Christ to the world. Because each piece is individually hand-crafted and painted, size and color could vary slightly.

- Hand-crafted item -- Color, size and/or motif may vary slightly About our Artist: 'From the time I was a boy, I was attracted to art,' recalls Alejandro de Esesarte. 'When I was 20, I became an ecologist and defender of nature, and this is when I began to create animals in metal. My technique is similar to cutout metal, but more rudimentary. From this, I became inspired and started working in metal for its versatility. Today I have a workshop, a cockatoo named Coco and a cactus collection. Those are all the tools I need to continue working.'

Features:

  • Remembered for his beautiful landscape works featuring his native countryside of Denmark, Peder Mork Mønsted's ability to depict water with serene beauty seems to be one that arouses the greatest admiration. The way he captured the light and form of rivers and brooks and the surface reflections are breathtakingly beautiful.
  • Giclee Print Technology: Using archival-quality inks onto premium canvases, giclee printing guarantees incredible detail, phenomenal quality, and vibrant colors. Saturated colors for up to 100 years.
  • Print enclosed in an intricately patterned Golden-relief frame to enhance the look of the artwork. Picture Size: 30 x 16", Total Size w/ Frame: 36 x 22", Each panel is ready to hang.
  • Packed in carton box, each panel is carefully sealed by bubble corner wrap protection. Plus free professional picture hanging tools, include gloves, nails, and gradient (level).
  • Brand Quality: production from one of the world's leading wall decor manufacturers, DecorArts a registered Trademark. Made in the USA.

Binding: Kitchen

Details: Peder Mork Mondsted's was born near Grenaa in Denmark. He began his artistic training in Aarhus, then studied at the Academy of Copenhagen from 1875 to 1879. Demonstrating his remarkable eye for detail, color, and light, his paintings represent a romantic and poetic view of nature and captured the grandeur and monumental aspect of the landscape art form.

Brand Quality: Production from one of the world's leading wall decor manufacturers

Made in USA: Real handcrafted canvas prints produced and hand-stretched in California. We believe that your office/home decor influences your lifestyle. Allow DecorArts to be your agent of inspiration and we will work hard to deliver beautiful art for your walls. About Giclee Prints Pronounced 'Zhee-Clay', the word comes from 'gicleur' which is the French technical term for an inkjet nozzle. Giclee printing is a type of inkjet printing - but not all inkjet prints can be considered a Giclee. In order for a print to be considered a true Giclee, it must meet at least two basic criteria:

1. The paper or substrate used to actually print the final piece must be of archival quality. Typically it will say it is acid free and consists of a 100% cotton base.

2. True Giclees are printed using pigment-based inks rather than the dye-based inks found in lower cost inkjets. Pigment-based inks have a longer life span that can last anywhere from 100 to 200 years without significant fading. The quality of the Giclee print rivals traditional silver-halide and gelatin printing processes and is commonly found in museums, art galleries, and photographic galleries.

title: Super Suction Wireless Car Vacuum Cleaner
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (3-7 Days)

 

Super Suction Wireless Car Vacuum Cleaner

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ
1. Why can't the vacuum cleaner work when charging?
For safety reasons, it will not work when it is charging. When it is fully charged, it can be used normally after disconnecting. This is not the quality problem of the product.

2. Starting the vacuum cleaner does not respond?
Due to the long time of international logistics transportation, please check the battery level of the product when you receive the product. If there is no power, please charge it for 2 hours and then start it.

3. Can HEPA be washed with water?
Do not wash the HEPA filter unit with water. Clean it with a brush or paper towel.

4. The noise of the vacuum cleaner mainly comes from three aspects:
Pneumatic noise, mechanical noise and electromagnetic noise, and the motor is a series-excited motor, the speed is in the range of 20,000 to 25,000 rpm, so the noise is relatively large.

5. What is the vacuum degree of the vacuum cleaner?
The degree of vacuum is another important indicator of the vacuum cleaner. The larger the degree of vacuum, the greater the suction power.

title: Table fireplace, table fire outdoor bioethanol table fireplace, tabletop fireplace indoor outdoor fire pit balcony accessories
body_html:
Highlights

Clean and Smoke Free: This table fire pit uses alcohol as a combustion energy source, does not generate smoke, is environmentally friendly and has a good atmosphere

Ventless and Portable: This mini table-top fireplace is easy to transport and use, whether indoors or outdoors, you can set up and use it whenever you want

Tempered glass with high thickness: The table fire bowl is equipped with two baffles made of tempered glass, which can improve the view of the flame and better protect your safety.

Fiberglass wick: absorb as much alcohol as possible to prevent the alcohol from evaporating quickly. The high ignition point is used as a flame retardant to ensure long-term use.

Warm note: There is no ethanol fuel in the package. The burn time is approx. 60-70 minutes when completely filled with fuel; Please use alcohol with a concentration of 95% or higher

Specification

Brand:Ciraume

Details

Specifications:


Glass screen: 185x90x4mm
Chimney subframe: 230x120x45mm
Fire destroyer: 130x30x95mm
Ethanol combustion nose: 160x50x35mm
Insulated base: 175x65x35mm
Packing box size: 260x130x60mm
Weight: 1000g
The package includes:
2x glass baffle
1x chimney subframe
1x ethanol combustion nose
1x fire killer
1x Isolated base

 

Note:

 

1. Please make sure to lower the temperature of the fireplace after use, then clean it to avoid burns.
2. Do not refill bioethanol when the product is still hot.
3. In an emergency, wear heat-resistant gloves for operation.
4.  The alcohol content should not exceed the maximum alcohol scale in order to avoid danger.
5. Please use it after placing it securely on a flat surface.
6. Please use it in a breeze or in a windless environment.
7. Do not let children use it alone.
8. Please ensure that the fireplace is stored in a dry environment.
9. If it accidentally leaks, please use fine sand or a damp cloth to extinguish the fire. Please do not use water to extinguish the fire.
10. Keep away when using flammable and explosive materials.
11. Do not cook food over a fire.
12. Do not use the fire for heating or boiling water, or as a cooking utensil.
13 Do not put charcoal, paper, wood, or other flammable objects on the fire.

title: The Seven Chakra Symbols on Organic Materials
body_html:
Material origin: Southern Tirol, Austria

We all find ourselves in moments when our thoughts wander into the realm of our childhood memories. All those long summers at our grandparent’s place, running barefoot through the backyard, the whiff of freshly cut grass floating in the air and not a single care in the world. 

Chanel your chakra with our Chakra Yoga phone case, with natural organic hand-picked alpine hay backing. The texture and aroma of the hay will transport you to a freshly mowed hayfield and will let you find peace and calmness in this crazy world. Its unique scent will renew your spirit and leave you feeling relaxed and prepare your mind and body for the challenges of tomorrow. Choose your own favorite chakra and take it with you in your pocket for an easy and quick meditation anywhere and anytime.

Many worldly traditions, such as Vedic, Taoism, and Buddhism have long recognized a complex system of subtle energy centers in the human body called Chakras, Sanskrit for "wheel" or "circle." Chakras refer to our energy center in our bodies. Every single one refers to a bundle of nerves and major organs. There are seven main chakras that run through our center from the top of our head to the base of our spine.

• Crown chakra - Sahasrara is located on the top of our head and represents the spiritual connection to yourself, others, or the universe, it also plays a big role in your life's purpose.
• Third eye chakra - Ajna is located between our eyes and is responsible for intuition and is also linked to the imagination.
• Throat chakra - Vishuddha is located in your throat. This chakra has to do with our ability to communicate verbally.
• Heart chakra - Anahata is located in the center of your chest, near your heart. It is all about our ability to love and show compassion.
• Solar plexus chakra - Manipura is located in your stomach. It is responsible for your confidence and self-esteem and it helps you feel in control of your life.
• Sacral chakra - Svadhisthana is located below our belly button. It is responsible for your sexual and creative energy and also how you relate to your and other people's emotions.
• Root chakra - Muladhara is located in the base of your spine. It provides you the foundation for life, it helps you feel grounded and ready to withstand challenges. Also, it is responsible for your sense of security and stability.

To function at their best, your chakras need to stay open, or balanced. If these energy centers get blocked, you may experience physical or emotional symptoms related to a particular chakra.

Take your senses on a journey with the world’s first sustainable organic smartphone cases made from hand-picked and pressed natural materials.

A natural scent the cover emits will create a joyful moment every time you make a call and the texture of the cases makes handling your phone a pleasant experience. Each case is handcrafted and unique, just like your style.

  • Made out of handpicked sustainable organic material
  • Full phone encasing, above screen lip, and durability for maximum protection 
  • Attractive modern look and style
  • Provides great grip
  • Doesn't cause allergies :)
  • The first of its kind in the world
  • Material coated with advanced sugar based resin
  • Water-resistant for all-weather use
  • Recyclable PU case (made in SGS certified non-toxic production)
  • Amazing natural scent and feeling
  • Works perfectly with WIRELESS CHARGING
  • Mag Safe compatible

Description


This air fryer makes it possible to enjoy healthier versions of your favorite foods by frying them with a tablespoon or less of oil and draining excess fat during cooking.
 
Rapid Air technology circulates air around the entire unit, heating up to 400 degrees to ensure all food is cooked evenly throughout. Food becomes crispy on the outside and tender on the inside with little to no oil. The Air fryer does more than just fry. It can also grill, roast, and even bake your food, so you have more options when feeding your family or entertaining guests.
 
Don't hesitate to buy it home!
